text: SELECT course_id, COUNT(student_id) FROM enrollment GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT department_id, AVG(salary) FROM employee GROUP BY department_id;
SELECT title FROM books WHERE publication_year > 2015;
SELECT customer_name FROM orders GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 5;
SELECT name FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE professor = 'John Smith';
SELECT product_name FROM sales ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE employee_count > 10;
